page.title: 19Housing and Housing Costs.
page.content: The majority of the housing in the area is privately owned, although there is a small Council Estate. The general development has been small, private estates radiating out from the original village roads. Some of this development, including the re-sited Primary School, has been on land originally owned by {Wellington {College.} The general feeling of the residents is probably best summed up by Jayne (aged 10):- "....not many people move out of Little Sandhurst because they like it so much. We have lived here two years and like it a lot. Little Sandhurst is an interesting, serene place to live."
